overview: King of the Candian riding police is up against Japs and Nazis who are about to invade Canada. They just want to clear the way with a new futuristic plane called "The Falcon" first, but that's not gonna happen if Kig has his way.
tagline: WRITTEN IN BLOOD! A New Page Of Heroic Exploits Destined To Achieve Immortal Fame In The Archives of History!...
title: King of the Mounties
